item.title: Path Finding in the Lightning Network
item.description: Location: Chaincode Residency 2019 Introduction Today I’m going to talk a little bit about path finding on the Lightning Network and some part of it will be about the gossip protocol which is like a little bit of a review of what the gossip messages are going to look like. So it’s a little bit basic again. But other than that, I’ve been told that you seek more for like opinionated talks and recent ideas instead of, like, how the bolts work because you already know all of that.
